label: Key
desc: unique identifier for each system. The yaml input files have the same name.

label: Host
desc: host [LVDB key] of system [MW, LMC, M31, etc]

label: Confirmed Real
desc: system has been confirmed with either deeper photometry, follow-up spectroscopy, proper motion, or other methods (not a chance alignment of stars).

label: Confirmed Dwarf
desc: system has been confirmed to be dwarf galaxy (or star cluster) based on spectroscopy, and/or deeper photometry.

label: aₕ
desc: major axis of the half-light radius (or plummer radius)

label: mᵥ
desc: apparent magnitude in V-band. Corrected for extinction.
reference for line of sight velocity

label: μ_α
desc: systemic proper motion in right ascension, includes cos(dec) term following Gaia

label: μ_δ
desc: systemic proper motion in declination direction

label: [Fe/H]_iso
desc: metallicity from isochrone or cmd fitting

label: Mv
desc: absolute V-band magnitude, computed from distance modulus and V-band apparent magnitude

label: Stellar Mass
desc: log10 stellar mass assuming M/L=2 and computed from M_V

label: D_⊙
desc: heliocentric distance, computed from distance modulus

label: M_{HI}
desc: log10 HI mass computed from HI flux and distance

label: [Fe/H]
desc: union of spectroscopic, photometric, and isochrone, spectroscopic preferred over photometric metallicity, and photometric over isochrone

label: Metallicity Type
desc: lists whether metallicity column is photometric, isochrone or spectroscopic.

label: Velocity rel. to Galactic standard
desc: Velocity in Galactic standard of rest frame

label: Velocity rel. to LG
desc: Velocity of system relative to the Local Group centroid

label: Dynamical Mass (Wolf)
desc: Dynamical mass within 3D half-light radius using the dynamical mass estimator in Wolf et al. 2010

label: rₕ
desc: half-light radius in physical units – rhalf * distance

label: r½
desc: azimuthally-averaged half-light radius (geometric mean); rhalf * distance * sqrt(1-ellipticity)

label: μ_r½
desc: average surface brightness within azimuthally-averaged half-light radius
